trans-unit.source: Renders the contained 3-D content within the 2-D layout bounds of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 呈現 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D" /> 項目之 2-D 配置邊界內所包含的 3-D 內容。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D> element renders 3-D content while providing features consistent with <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> objects including 2-D layout, clipping, and input events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D>項目呈現 3d 內容同時提供與一致的功能<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>包括 2-d 配置、 裁剪，以及輸入的事件的物件。

trans-unit.source: When this element is included as the content of a layout element like <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>, specify the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D> by setting its <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> properties (inherited from <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>).
trans-unit.target: 當這個項目會包含版面配置項目的內容為就像<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>，指定的大小<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D>藉由設定其<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>屬性 (繼承自<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D> extends 2-D hit testing into the 3-D scene by extruding the 2-D hit test point into a 3-D ray.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D> 擴充 2 D 點擊測試到 3d 場景 extruding 3d 光線的 2d 點擊的測試點。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper.HitTest%2A> method to return detailed hit result information about the hit visual, model, mesh, and point of intersection.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper.HitTest%2A>方法以傳回詳細叫用點擊的視覺效果的結果資訊、 模型、 網狀結構中，以及各種交集點。

trans-unit.source: On Microsoft Windows XP, if the display color quality is not set to 32-bit or 16-bit, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D> might not render as expected.
trans-unit.target: 在 Microsoft Windows XP 中，如果未設定為 32 位元或 16 位元，顯示色彩品質<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D>可能無法如預期般轉譯。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Size that <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D" /> will assume.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D" /> 將會假設所需大小。

trans-unit.source: Causes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D" /> to arrange its visual content to fit a specified size.
trans-unit.target: 讓 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D" /> 排列其視覺化內容，以符合指定的大小。

trans-unit.source: The final size of the arranged <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D" />.
trans-unit.target: 排列 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D" /> 的最終大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a camera object that projects the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] contents of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D" /> to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] surface of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定相機物件，以將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D" /> 的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] 內容投射到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D" /> 的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] 表面。

trans-unit.source: The camera that projects the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] contents to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] surface.
trans-unit.target: 相機，可將 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] 內容投射到 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] 表面。

trans-unit.source: This property represents the viewing projection of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_3d](~/includes/tla2sharptla-3d-md.md)] scene.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性表示的檢視投影[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_3d](~/includes/tla2sharptla-3d-md.md)]場景。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: The metadata type on this dependency property is <xref:System.Windows.PropertyMetadata>, not <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata>.
trans-unit.target: 此相依性屬性的中繼資料型別是<xref:System.Windows.PropertyMetadata>，而非<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D.Camera%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D> using code.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D.Camera%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D>使用程式碼。

trans-unit.source: To see the entirety of the code from which this excerpt was taken, see [How to: Create a 3-D Scene](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-create-a-3-d-scene.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D.Camera%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D> using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D.Camera%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D>使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: To see the entirety of the code from which this excerpt was taken, see [How to: Create a 3-D Scene](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-create-a-3-d-scene.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看完整的這段摘錄從中取得程式碼，請參閱[How to： 建立 3d 場景](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-create-a-3-d-scene.md)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D.Camera" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D.Camera" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D" /> children of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D" /> 之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D" /> 子系的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D" /> children of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D" /> 之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D" /> 子系的集合。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D.Children" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D.Children" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Position of the element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合內項目的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> at a specified position in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D.Children" /> collection of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D.Children" /> 集合內指定之位置的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D" />。

trans-unit.source: Visual at the specified position in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D.Children" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D.Children" /> 集合內指定之位置的視覺化。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.Viewport3DAutomationPeer" /> object for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.Viewport3DAutomationPeer" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.Viewport3DAutomationPeer" /> object for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.Viewport3DAutomationPeer" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An object to add as a child.
trans-unit.target: 要加入做為子系的物件。

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基礎結構，但是您不可以從程式碼直接使用它。

trans-unit.source: A string to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至物件的字串。

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基礎結構，但是您不可以從程式碼直接使用它。

trans-unit.source: Gets an integer that represents the number of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> objects in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ModelVisual3D.Children" /> collection of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得整數，這個整數代表在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ModelVisual3D.Children" /> 集合內，<see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D" /> 物件的數目。

trans-unit.source: Integer that represents the number of Visuals in the Children collection of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D" />.
trans-unit.target: 整數，代表在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D" /> 的「子系」集合中，實際的「視覺項目」數目。
